         log_factorial_k = torch.lgamma(value + 1)
         log_factorial_nmk = torch.lgamma(self.total_count - value + 1)

-                value * self.logits + (self.total_count - value) * torch.log1p(-probs))

body:
@alicanb I trust tests more than manual inspection of code. Could you add some more test data in `test_binomial_log_prob()`, something like?
```py
probs = torch.arange(0.05, 1, 0.1) 
```
and check multiple total sizes `[0, 1, 2, 10]`?
